name: Live On [PROTOTYPE]
description:
Live On is a top down rogue-lite game, u as the player starts in a dungeon filled with enemies. You as the player has only one way in this dungeon, and it is further down. 

Most of the assets in this game has been found either released in the public domain or with a Creative Commons license. 

This game was developed as our second semester trial project at Dania Games, where we are currently studying for a degree in Computer Science. 

[Disclaimer] 

As shown in the title this game is a prototype and so is not nearly finished. For that we want to share what the game's (supposed) future was gonna be.

The game you see now is merely 20% of what the supposed game was gonna be like.

To make it easier for you and for ourselves we are gonna list all the things that currently is not there, that was supposed to be there:

- 5 Levels

- 32 different rooms for each floors

- Randomized (Items, Loot, Rooms, Stats, Bosses)

- Bosses

- A lootpool for different kind of items

- Equipment

These things were to be present if we might've had more time and the enthusiasm to build further on it.

Controls:

Only control for the PC players (Sorry controller users)

Key/mouse

Actions

LeftMouseClick

Attacks(Melee)

RightMouseClick

Attack(Ranged)

E

Interacts with items

Spacebar

Attack(Ranged)

esc

Goes to the menu

WASD

Movement
